resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1872</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Apollonia-Arsuf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Apollonia-Arsuf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apollonia-Arsuf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apollonia-Arsuf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Apollonia-Arsuf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απολλονηα- Arsuf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Apollonia-Arsuf</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This web page describes archaelogical remains of The Crusader city and fortress, now known as Apollonia-Arsuf, that is situated on a cliff overlooking the Mediterranean</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crusaders</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fortress</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Webseite beschreibt des archaelogical 
Remains der Kreuzfahrerstadt und -festung, jetzt bekannt als 
Apollonia-Arsuf, das auf einer Klippe aufgestellt wird, die das 
Mittelmeer übersieht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette page Web décrit les restes archaelogical 
de la ville et de la forteresse de croisé, maintenant connus sous le 
nom d'apollonia-Arsuf, qui est situé sur une falaise donnant sur le 
méditerranéen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este Web page descreve o remains archaelogical da 
cidade e do fortress do cruzado, sabido agora como Apollonia-Arsuf, 
que situated em um penhasco que negligencia o mediterranean</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo Web page descrive il remains archaelogical 
della città e del fortress del crociato, ora conosciuto come 
Apollonia-Arsuf, che è situato su una scogliera che trascura il 
Mediterraneo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ιστοσελίδας περιγράφει τα archaelogical 
υπολείμματα της πόλης και του φρουρίου σταυροφόρων, τώρα γνωστά 
ως απολλονηα- Arsuf, το οποίο είναι τοποθετημένο σε έναν 
απότομο βράχο αγνοώντας τη Μεσόγειο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este Web page describe el restos archaelogical de 
la ciudad y de la fortaleza del cruzado, ahora conocido como 
Apollonia-Arsuf, que se sitúa en un acantilado que pasa por alto el 
mediterráneo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzfahrer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Festung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">croisés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forteresse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cruzados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fortress</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Israele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">crociati</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fortress</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Israel</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cruzados</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fortaleza</string>
          </keyword>
